dict.string: 1. Timeline is shown first. 2. Tags! 3. Albums and tags are now hidden behind the Photos screen. Guess where they are. :) 4. Pinch in and out in Photos screen to see more or less photos.

Hello guys and girls!
How are you all doing? Itâ€™s been a while since the last update, busy with day job :) Some new things in this update and there are still some cool things I want to add to Delightful.
Anyway, how do you find the app so far? Like it? Hate it? Need improvement? Let me know, please. Reach me on Twitter @nicnocquee or simply reply to TestFlight email.
Cheers, Nico
